author: guitarskills2

text:
Ueda is staying on in a freelance capacity to help finish the game - so it's not all doom and gloom. It does beg the question though, what is the big hold up?  Something was clearly going wrong at Team ICO.

The PS3 is heading for its twilight years (I think PS4 will be on shelves in 2013-2014) and this game has been in development since before the PS3 was launched.  That's pretty excessive, even for Ueda.

author: IAmLuisRomero

text: Beautiful track from Otani for a beautiful game. There's been a lot going on recently with The Last Guardian, Project ICO's next game. The director Ueda left and another person as well so I have to wonder if Sony might have interfered, maybe not too pleased with the game's very slow development. It's a shame though because Team ICO is awesome. It's giving me bad memories of Konami disbanding Team Silent which made the first 4 Silent Hill games.
author: SupraDarky
